main.name: Kedar Kshatriya
main.description: Here will be your description. Use this to describe what you do or whatever you feel best describes yourself to a potential employer
main.bio: Use this bio section as your way of describing yourself and saying what you do, what technologies you like to use or feel most comfortable with, describing your personality, or whatever else you feel like throwing in.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.school: D.Y. Patil Institute of Engineering, Management and Research
education.description: Is a core committee member of various clubs of our Institute like Astronomy Club, Rotaract Club, COMPSA, EDC Club, ACM Students Chapter.

work.title: Marketing Intern
work.description2: In this internship I promoted the Bolt IoT Course and their hardware module in our college   and helped the students.
work.description3: Hosted a seminar in our college for 100 students from Computer and Entc Branch.
work.description4: This internship was for a time period of 2 Months.

work.title: Research Fellowship
work.description1: Selected among 25 students from India to complete research project's in AIT for 2 months.
work.description2: Developed on Ethereum Blockchain for Transportation of Sensitive Goods.
work.description3: Extended this application to implement real time data tracking (Temperature,luminosity) using IoT sensors and this data was stored on blockchain for quality maintenance.
work.description4: Stored data was further used to auto calculate the cost of goods based on their quality.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
